jobDescription: Requirement::: Data Analyst Job Summary: This role requires a senior systems analyst with a technical background who can perform Batch testing for the Facets application. The scope of the position is to build a Job Trail to run Facets batch jobs using Windows scheduler. This candidate will be responsible for creating and managing a daily tasks list.  The successful candidate will possess the following: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment running a high volume of batch jobs and will need to ensure weekly deliverables are metHave a Deep Facets background or ability to be able to quickly learn about the Facets batch cycleAbility to be a self-starter and work with minimal supervision as there will be limited knowledge transfer/ trainingRequired:6+ years of relevant work experienceExcellent time management and communication skillsSelf- starter, highly motivated and a technical backgroundStrong SQL knowledge is a mustDeep Facets or Healthcare backgroundAbility to report status to managementExcellent verbal and written communication skillsMedicaid background a Hugh plus
